act.title: Write it Yourself!
act.intro: Use the English prompts to create four sentences using the characters below.

item.prompt: My name is Mao Xiao Long.

item.hanzi: 我有一个姐姐和一个弟弟
item.prompt: I have an older sister and a younger brother.

item.hanzi: 我爸爸退休了,我妈妈是医生
item.prompt: My father is retired, my mother works as a doctor.
